LanguageData.VPE_SpeedBoost.label: psychic agility
LanguageData.VPE_SpeedBoost.description: Psychically induced agility boost, greatly increasing movement speed.
LanguageData.VPE_BladeFocus.label: blade focus
LanguageData.VPE_BladeFocus.description: Psychically induced combat focus, greatly enhancing melee combat capabilities.
LanguageData.VPE_FiringFocus.label: firing focus
LanguageData.VPE_FiringFocus.description: Psychically induced combat focus, greatly enhancing ranged combat capabilities.
LanguageData.VPE_AdrenalineRush.label: psychic rush
LanguageData.VPE_AdrenalineRush.description: Psychically induced adrenaline rush, increasing sight, hearing and movement capabilities.
LanguageData.VPE_ControlledFrenzy.label: psychic frenzy
LanguageData.VPE_ControlledFrenzy.description: Temporary, psychically induced frenzy. The energy restores itself with each consecutive kill.
LanguageData.VPE_GuidedShot.label: guided shot
